Visits.VisitNarrative: Patient presented with elevated blood pressure and reports mild dizziness. Current medications include Metformin for diabetes and Lisinopril for hypertension. Prescribed Atorvastatin for cholesterol and Amlodipine to manage hypertension.

Patient reported shortness of breath and frequent heartburn. Current medications include Albuterol for asthma and Omeprazole for acid reflux. Prescribed Montelukast to prevent asthma symptoms and Fluticasone as a maintenance inhaler.

Patient presented with swelling in the lower extremities and mild fatigue. Currently taking Levothyroxine for hypothyroidism. Prescribed Hydrochlorothiazide for fluid retention and Losartan to address hypertension.
Patient presented for routine follow-up of anticoagulation therapy. Currently taking Warfarin. Due to difficulties managing INR levels, prescribed Dabigatran as an alternative.
